sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="inspire">
    <v-content>
      <v-container class="fill-height" fluid>
        <v-row align="center" justify="center">
          <v-col cols="12" sm="8" md="4">
            <v-card class="elevation-12">
              <v-card-text>
                <v-form>
                  <v-text-field v-model="input.login" label="Login" name="login" type="text" />
                  <v-text-field
                    v-model="input.email"
                    label="Adres e-mail"
                    name="email"
                    type="email"
                  />
                  <v-text-field
                    v-model="input.password1"
                    label="Hasło"
                    name="password1"
                    type="password"
                  />
                  <v-text-field
                    v-model="input.password2"
                    label="Powtórz hasło"
                    name="password2"
                    type="password"
                  />
                </v-form>
              </v-card-text>
              <v-card-actions>
                <v-spacer />
                <v-btn @click="handlePressRegister()" color="primary">Zarejestruj się</v-btn>
                <v-btn text @click="handlePressLogin()">Zaloguj się</v-btn>
              </v-card-actions>
            </v-card>
            <v-snackbar v-model="snackbar" :timeout="timeout">
              {{ snackText }}
              <v-btn color="blue" text @click="snackbar = false">Zamknij</v-btn>
            </v-snackbar>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-content>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";
axios.defaults.baseURL = "http://localhost:4000";
export default {
  name: "RegistrationPage",
  data() {
    return {
      snackbar: false,
      timeout: 3000,
      snackText: "",
      input: {
        login: "",
        email: "",
        password1: "",
        password2: ""
      }
    };
  },
  methods: {
    handlePressRegister() {
      /* eslint-disable no-console */
      //console.log("Zostałeś pomyślnie zarejestrowany do systemu");
      /* eslint-enable no-console */
      axios
        .post("/api/register", {
          login: this.input.login,
          email: this.input.email,
          password: this.input.password1
        })
        .then(
          response => {
            if (response.data.status != 201) {
              /* eslint-disable no-console */
              console.log(response.data.message);
              this.snackText = response.data.message;
              this.snackbar = true;
              /* eslint-enable no-console */
            } else {
              this.snackText = response.data.message;
              this.snackbar = true;
              setTimeout(function(){window.location.href="/"} , 3000);
            }
          },
          error => {
            /* eslint-disable no-console */
            console.log(error);
            /* eslint-enable no-console */
          }
        );
    },
    handlePressLogin() {
      window.location.href = "/";
    }
  }
};
</script>
